extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the physical neck of the guitar and its behaviour

      • findFingerings

        public java.util.ArrayList<sk.matus.ksp.guitarist_swiss_knife.Fingering> findFingerings(java.util.HashSet<sk.matus.ksp.guitarist_swiss_knife.Tone> chord)
        Method that attempts to find possible finger layouts for the supplied chord on the currently tuned GuitarNeck
        Parameters:
        chord - The chord we want to play
        Returns:
        ArrayList of instances of Fingering, sorted by the difficulty
